Content.Data:
==What to Do==
Use stack smashing protection offered by the compiler.
==Why==
Stack cookies help mitigate buffer overflow vulnerabilities.
==How==
To use stack cookies: # **Open XCode.** Launch the XCode IDE. # **Add compiler flags.** Add the //-fstack-protector-all// flag to each file that is to be compiled in the XCode "Compile Sources" window in the "Compiler Flags" column.
